message.content: This question requires knowledge about the basic needs of whales. Whales are mammals, which means they require oxygen to survive, just like humans and other mammals. Option (B) is incorrect because whales do not need fishing, they need food like fish and krill to eat. Option (C) is incorrect because whales do not need mercury, it is actually harmful to them. Option (D) is incorrect because whales do not need boats, they are independent creatures that live in the ocean.

This question requires basic knowledge about the needs of whales. Whales, like all living organisms, require oxygen to survive. Option (B) is incorrect because whales do not need fishing, as they are not dependent on human activities for their survival. Option (C) is incorrect because whales do not need mercury, as it is a toxic substance that can harm them. Option (D) is incorrect because whales do not need boats, as they are capable of swimming and navigating through the water on their own.
